name: hedgehog home demo
description:
Hedgehog Home is a educational virtual pet game, about looking after a European Hedgehog!

- Answer questions to learn more about Hedgehogs!

- Play mini-games with your hedgehog!

- Unlock decorations and customise the area! 

- Note: this is a demo! aspects of the game are not yet finalised.  progress does not save -

Links to learn more about Hedgehogs, and what we can do to help them:

https://www.wildlifetrusts.org/wildlife-explorer/mammals/european-hedgehog

https://www.worldlandtrust.org/species/mammals/european-hedgehog/ 

http://swccharity.org/hedgehog-fact-sheet/

Credits:

Special thanks to friends for helping me design and playtest :)
